mapper.select: select * from commission c left join student s on c.student_id = s.id where c.id = #{commissionId}

select c.content, c.id, c.student_id as studentId, c.accept_student_id as acceptStudentId, c.accept_name as acceptName, c.date, c.money, c.status, c.address as commissionAddress, c.contact, c.limit_sex as limitSex, s.id,
s.address, s.birthday, s.email, s.enrollment_time, s.`name`, s.school, s.avatar, s.phone from commission c left join student s on c.student_id = s.id where s.id = #{studentId} order by c.date desc
